insert into fmea_benchmark_plan (task, responsibler, plan_start_time, actual_start_time, plan_finsh_time, actual_finsh_time, fmea_id) values (#{task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{responsibler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planFinshTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualFinshTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fmeaId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update fmea_benchmark_plan set task = #{task,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, responsibler = #{responsibler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_start_time = #{planStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actual_start_time = #{actualStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_finsh_time = #{planFinshTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actual_finsh_time = #{actualFinshTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fmea_id = #{fmeaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, task, responsibler, plan_start_time, actual_start_time, plan_finsh_time, actual_finsh_time, fmea_id from fmea_benchmark_plan where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
